summary: The Intelligence Community Technology Bridge Act of 2025 establishes a fund within the Treasury to aid in the transition of products or services from research and development to prototype or production phases within the intelligence community. The Director of National Intelligence will administer the fund, providing assistance primarily to small businesses and nontraditional defense contractors. Funds can be distributed as grants, payments, or equity.  The bill authorizes $75 million annually, with reports to be submitted to congressional intelligence committees.
